data.text: Type in the correct word in the blank space provided.
data.question: The first Caliph of the Muslims was Hazrat __________ (RA).
The first four caliphs of Islam are known as the __________ Guided Caliphs.
The second Rightly Guided Caliph was Hazrat __________ Ibn al-Khattab (RA).
The compilation of the Holy Quran was done during the caliphate of Hazrat __________ Ibn Affan (RA).
The fourth Rightly Guided Caliph was Hazrat __________ (RA).
The two major groups of Muslims are __________ and __________.
Amir Muawiya Ibn Abu Sufyan moved the capital of the Islamic empire to __________.
The point where the Muslims crossed the Mediterranean is known as __________ or Jabal-al-Tariq.
The Umayyad rule ended when the __________ came to power.
The Delhi Sultanate was set up by Qutbuddin __________.
data.feedback: Oh no! That's not correct! Try again!
